Package gov.nih.nlm.ling.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContiguousLexeme
    An interface for contiguous lexical units.
    ContiguousSurfaceElement
    An interface for contiguous textual units, which extends SurfaceElement interface.
    Lexeme
    An interface that represents an abstract, non-inflected lexical unit.
    SurfaceElement
    An interface to represent textual units.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLexeme
    The basic implementation of the Lexeme interface.
    AbstractSurfaceElement
    The basic implementation of SurfaceElement interface.
    Document
    The representation of a basic document, consisting of sentences.
    GappedLexeme
    A representation of a lexical unit with non-contiguous parts.
    GappedMultiWord
    Represents a textual unit with non-contiguous parts.
    MultiWord
    Represents a contiguous textual unit with more than one token.
    MultiWordLexeme
    A representation of a contiguous, multi-part lexical unit.
    Section
    Representation of a section of a Document.
    Sentence
    Representation of a sentence, a list of which form a Document.
    Span
    Represents the character offsets of a linguistic object.
    SpanList
    Represents the character offsets of a linguistic object.
    SurfaceElementFactory
    A factory class to create textual units, from character offsets or a list of smaller textual units.
    SynDependency
    Represents a syntactic dependency between two textual units.
    Word
    Representation of a single token with sentence index, part-of-speech, lemma, and span information.
    WordLexeme
    Representation of a single lexeme, manifested in text as a Word.
